title: IT'S ALL A LIE!!! DON'T DO OT
body:
Just to let everyone know, there is a fake "Free Championship Riven Giveaway". All my friends have been sending this link:
_link removed_
It is fake. Riot isn't going to give away Championship Riven and also, it needs you to login and it needs your e-mail. My friends caught on it's fake, so just to let everyone know, IT'S FAKE AND DONT LOGIN AND DON'T EVEN THINK IT'S REAL!! For your own safety of your League of Legends account, just to be safe, don't even click the link.


Thanks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
While it's good that you're telling people not to click on it, it's always good to get rid of scams. But I kinda don't really see the point.
You would have to be a compete retard to click it and fill in the details anyway..

**Firstly**, I can't remember a time when riot DID give out free codes online for no reason.

**Secondly**, its not on any of the server websites or on the client itself... And how many events have there been that haven't shown up on any of those places? None.

**Thirdly**, Yea... Sure... of course riot is going to give out free codes of the most sought after skin in the game, just to anyone who asks, merely weeks before its much anticipated grand release, during which they make an absolute fortune...

I actually can't comprehend the number of brain cells that would need to be missing for someone to actually think that...

Have a little more faith in people's intelligence.

Thanks for bringing the new scam to everyones attention. I edited out the link incase some people tried to click it anyway. 

>Any promotions or events ran will be announced and confirmed by Riot and will be hosted on one of the following domains:

>www.riotgames.com
www.leagueoflegends.com
>www.lolesports.com

Unfortunately scams do go around quite often and people get excited and fall trap to them. I suggest sending the link into Riot support so they can investigate it further. 

If you believe that either your, or one of your friend's accounts have been compromised, have a read of our "[guide to scams](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GVrAi62-security-reminder-beware-of-scamsphishing-sites)" post for further information :)

I also added it to our list of scam links that are blocked on the boards! 

Watch out for something along the lines of: _http://%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%.com/Riven/giveaway/_ if you're in the client.

That will be the link **Digestive Cookie** is referring too.
